H0.text: The age of the railway began in which year with the introduction of the Liverpool-Manchester line. 1825

H1.text: The age of the railway began in which year with the introduction of the Liverpool-Manchester line. 1820

H2.text: The age of the railway began in which year with the introduction of the Liverpool-Manchester line. 1835

H3.text: The age of the railway began in which year with the introduction of the Liverpool-Manchester line. 1830

A4.text: It opened on 15 September 1830 between the Lancashire towns of Liverpool and Manchester in England.
